short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A extention that counts time for your tasks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Task Tracker is a timer extension. You will get new option on your right click menu. When you select the option and start working on new task, the extension also starts counting time for you.

The purpose of extension is; see how much time is spent on which task. 
Your current task time will be shown on extensions badge, so without any interrupt you can check how much time you spend.

Beside that, you can change your current task with old one, or add a new one easily. 
You will also see your old tasks and spent time on them. 

There is option to remove all your tasks, or you can export as excel file before erase your data.
Your tasks and data will be only stored in your local browser storage.
